name: dead-by-daylight-unraveled
story:
Hello Wanderer...

In the shifting fog and mysterious realms beyond, answers wait to be unveiled. A dark revelation must be brought to light.

Your journey begins as a saviorâ€”a champion, a messiah, the last beacon of hope amid utter despair. The path won't be easy, but you won't walk it alone. You'll forge unlikely alliances, and escape from this nightmare draws ever nearer.

Yet even in this deathless realm, the clock is ticking. You and your fellow survivors stand on borrowed time. Unravel the truth before you're consumed, Wanderer.
